column22:
- Some questions are leading (I believe they are not intended to be so) e.g., do you find X feature essential
- I got a bit confused at times when following the scenarios: whether the solution is trying to address all types of travel or one-two types at the same time. Because I sense that there might be slight differences in how we travel for work, business trip, and leisure, and they will influence what are the important information needed, in which channels/platform and how they will be communicated to passengers.
